text_block_list.text:
――Under the blazing sun came a 
sudden announcement of a competition.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
That's what they're calling the 『Arm Wrestling Tournament』, 
you see. Seems like the prize is dinner at a resort.

Tilting my head, I read over the pamphlet that was handed 
to me. The only event is 『Arm Wrestling』. Looks like it's 
separated in to Uma Musume and Trainer divisions……

The format is round robin. The winning team is 
decided by which pair has the most wins combined.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
――Only if you can exert it fully at the right 
time, can Power be called a trump card.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Seems like you've been keeping up with your training, 
since your body looks a bit more defined……
choice_data_list: There'd be no point, if I didn't

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. 
……Well then, just how much have you obtained?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Will it be a Joker, or just a Pierrot?
And so, the two of us decided to enter the tournament, but――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Hmmph!

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaah!?

text_block_list.name: Organizer
text_block_list.text:
T-the victor is……Gentildonnaーー! 
The 『Uma Musume Division』 winner is Gentildonna～～!!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Fuu……child's play.

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: No way! I-I couldn't even last a second……!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Even against other Uma Musume, there's that much of a difference……? 
She-……she's in an entirely different dimension……!

Power can only be called a trump card if it can be used 
correctly in the right place is what she said. But why 
is that? ……probably because there are secondary effects.

By showing off your power, you could control 
your own heart. Only then, for the first time, 
can Power become the ultimate trump card!

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Kuuu～～! An unexpected defeat……! 
Sorry! Trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Participating Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No, the competition isn't over yet! This is a battle 
to decide the strongest 『Pair』! Which means――
(Stare……!)

text_block_list.name: Participating Trainers
text_block_list.text: We just need to win against them!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Ara ara.

text_block_list.name: Organizer
text_block_list.text:
――What's this!? Gentildonna's Trainer is suddenly 
the focus of attention!? This could get ugly～!

text_block_list.name: Participating Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
……Hey, everyone, how about cooperating? To win this one, 
everyone needs to at least win against them, right?

text_block_list.name: Participating Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So when it's their turn, let's stand behind them and make 
weird faces, try and make them flinch, and create an opening 
and drain their energy so everyone can win! How's that sound!?

text_block_list.name: Macho Trainer
text_block_list.text:
……Hm. It's a bit cowardly, but we can't just give 
up on being the strongest. Alright! Count us in!

text_block_list.name: Organizer
text_block_list.text:
S-so this is their plan to turn things around! 
It's not really against the rules but……just what 
will happen with this many people involved～!?
(Whoooooooooooaaaa!!!!)

The entire venue was buzzing with a sense of mayhem. 
I could feel the intense stares coming from every direction.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Oh my, someone's in trouble.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara. Do you have a plan?

I nod. The primary focus is stamina management. 
If I run out of stamina early and then lose every 
game in the second half, I wouldn't be able to face her.

Focus on your opponent but be prepared to lose……only 
use your full power on someone you really need to beat. 
That was theoretically the optimal solution. However――

text_block_list.name: Participating Trainers
text_block_list.text:
Uooooooh!! With this we can win! I'll definitely win!! 
Fuhahahahaa! My muscles are getting pumped up!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……Fufu. Fufufu. 
Looks like you're having fun, but unfortunately for you――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: That person……is 『My』 trainer, you know?
(Bang!!)

text_block_list.name: Organizer
text_block_list.text:
M-match over……! 
Gentildonna's Trainer is victorious!!!

text_block_list.name: Participating Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Guaaah……N-no way…… 
To think there'd be……no chance to use our plan……!

If you think about it realistically, you should 
assess your opponent and adjust accordingly. But――
choice_data_list: If you have Power, that's unnecessary!

text_block_list.text: (Bang!!!)
(Baaang!!!!)

text_block_list.name: Macho Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Fuu. You're good……but your final opponent is me, 
Tracen's Strongest Super Macho Trainer! ……Hmmmmmph!

Looking at his muscles glistening under the sun, I take 
a deep breath. ……This is where I need to go full power.
choice_data_list: Then, I'll switch to my dominant hand!

text_block_list.name: Macho Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Ha ha ha! I see, I see! 
So here you'll have to use――wait, huh? Your dominant hand?

text_block_list.name: Macho Trainer
text_block_list.text: Then, does that mean you weren't serious……――U-ugyaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
――I see you've started to understand it a little now? 
Power, and it's true essence.

But, I'm still nowhere near seeing things from her perspective. 
It was too presumptuous to say I could stand next to her……However――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ――Here. I'll give this to you.

I took the iron weight from her. 
This was probably the one she bought that time――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
This 『Super Heavy Class』 iron weight……how is it? 
It's got quite a comfortable weight to it, right?

I rolled it around in my hands, remembering that 
it used to be so heavy. ……It was a good weight!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Hehe…… If you're going to walk around with that, 
you probably need a carrying case, don't you?
choice_data_list: I can stop by that shop next time!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Heh.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Quite the commendable spirit.
